title: Wire checkout contact to supplier; single favourite; voucher + redemption message
head: cursor/wire-checkout-to-supplier-single-favourite-voucher-2e1b
body:
## ðŸŽ¯ Overview
Wires checkout form inputs to the supplier page, enforces a single Favourite selection with microcopy on checkout, adds a static voucher number per requester, and shows a redemption note after acceptance.

## âœ¨ Changes
- **Checkout.jsx**: Attach checkout `contact` fields to the latest availability request; enforce one Favourite (hide other buttons once selected); add microcopy explaining Favourite.
- **SupplierPage.jsx**: Render real name/email/phone from `request.contact` with fallbacks; add static `Voucher: 400000000000`; show post-acceptance redemption message.
- **App.css**: Style `.voucher-info` row alongside phone/email rows.

## âœ… How to test
1. Go to Request to Book, select dates, then continue to Checkout.
2. Enter contact details and mark one Favourite (others should hide).
3. Send the request.
4. Open Supplier page: verify the real contact data and `Voucher: 400000000000`.
5. Select and accept a date: verify the redemption message appears under that user block.
